### Source code
https://github.com/ryanym/cs7641/tree/master/assignment4

### Directory Structure
```
├── experiments.py
├── figures
│   ├── gi_gamma.png
│   ├── gi_iter_lp.png
│   ├── pi_iter_lp.png
│   ├── q_decay.png
│   ├── q_gamma.png
│   ├── q_learning_rate_init.png
│   ├── q_learning_rate.png
│   ├── test.png
│   ├── vi_epsilon.png
│   ├── vi_gamma.png
│   └── vi_pi.png
├── README.txt
└── util.py
```
**figures** directory contains all plots generated by the experiments

### To Run Code ###
run experiments through experiments.py

### Dependencies 
- Python 3.+
- numpy
- pandas
- matplotlib
- sklearn
- seaborn
- mdptoolbox-hiive
